6.3 公告

6.3.1 公告页面

6.3.1.1 程序系统结构

页面路径：

TEClientFM/activities/components/work-desk/notice/Notice.vue

页面模块：

常用业务展示模块，以及常用业务展示维护模块。

6.3.1.1.1 CommonTrade添加常用交易组件

NoticeList聊天入口文件

TEClientFM\activities\components\work-desk\notice\NoticeList.vue

属性
参数 说明 类型 可选值 默认值 适用渠道 备注
activeList 公告列表
事件
事件名称 说明 回调参数 适用渠道 备注
openNotice 打开公告

6.3.1.2 功能简介

展示公告标题，点击公告跳转到详细公告信息页面，点击更多跳转到产品信息页面

6.3.1.3 数据库操作

功能 busidatakey 操作的数据库表名
更新消息状态 messginfo_upd IB_AUX_NOTICEDERAIL_INFO

代码详情

async openNotice(item, index) {
      //若公告状态为未读
      if (item.STATUS == "0") {
        let result = await this.communication(
          ServicesNames.DBCOMM,
          {
            CommCode: "DB",
            SceneCode: "DBComm",
            TradeData: JSON.stringify({
              _busidatakey_: "messginfo_upd",
                //序号
              NOTICEID: item.noticeId,
                //机构号
              ORGNO: this.sdm.BranchInfo.branchNum,
                //柜员号
              TLID: this.sdm.UserInfo.userNum,
              STATUS: "1",
                //改变时间
              ALTERTIME: DateUtils.getCurrentFormatTime("yyyyMMddHHmmss"),
            }),
          },
          false
        );
        if (result.isSuccess) {
          item.STATUS = "1";//noticeId
          this.cardnoteborderList[index].STATUS = "1";
          this.cardnoteborderList.forEach(cardItem=>{
            if(item.noticeId == cardItem.noticeId){
              cardItem.STATUS='1'
            }
          })
        }
      }
      this.$asyncOpenTrade(
        "@FM/modules/frame/notice/App.vue",
        "消息通知",
        "internalPanel",
        {
          item: item,
          cardnoteborderList: this.cardnoteborderList,
        }
      );
    }

6.3.2 维护公告页面

6.3.2.1 程序系统结构

页面路径：

@TETrade/modules/trade/pb/om/t00108001/App.vue

@TETrade/modules/trade/pb/om/t00108001/ConfigPage.vue

页面模块：

公告查询模块、公告维护模块

6.3.2.2 功能简介

根据输入条件查询公告，可对已发布公告进行修改、删除，还可以新增实时与定时公告。

6.3.2.3 数据库操作

功能 busidatakey 操作的数据库表名
获取岗位下拉 sel_post_appno IB_UPM_POST_INFO
查询公告信息 sel_noticeinfo IB_AUX_NOTICE_INFO
新增 insert_notice IB_AUX_NOTICE_INFO
修改 upd_notice_seqno IB_AUX_NOTICE_INFO
删除 del_notice_seqno IB_AUX_NOTICE_INFO

sql语句

获取岗位下拉

SELECT PSTN_ID,PSTN_NO,PSTN_NM FROM IB_UPM_POST_INFO WHERE APP_NO= ? ORDER BY PSTN_NO

根据APP_NO(应用编号)并用PSTN_NO(岗位编号)排序在IB_UPM_POST_INFO表中查询PSTN_ID(岗位id)、PSTN_NO(岗位编号)、PSTN_NM(岗位名称)。

相关代码

async getRcptnPstnOptions() {
      let res = await this.communication(ServicesNames.DBCOMM, {
        CommCode: "DB",
        SceneCode: "DBComm",
        TradeData: JSON.stringify({
          _busidatakey_: "sel_post_appno",
          APP_NO: "TE",
        }),
      });
      if (res.isSuccess) {
        let data = JSON.parse(res.data.Rslt).Result;
        let option = [];
        for (let item in data) {
          option.push({
            label: data[item].PSTN_NO + "-" + data[item].PSTN_NM,
            id: data[item].PSTN_NO,
            value: data[item].PSTN_ID,
          });
        }
        this.rcptnPstn_options.push({
          lable: "岗位",
          value: "",
          children: option,
        });
        //this.rcptnPstn_options = option;
        console.log("岗位列表", this.rcptnPstn_options);
      } else {
        await this.pushInfo(result.msg);
      }
    },

返回结果

Rslt: "{"PageNum":1,"totalNum":23,"TotNumOfPags":1,"Result":[{"PSTN_ID":"TEP001","PSTN_NM":"综合业务岗","PSTN_NO":"001"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP002","PSTN_NM":"业务主办岗","PSTN_NO":"002"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP005","PSTN_NM":"凭证管理岗","PSTN_NO":"005"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP006","PSTN_NM":"现金管理岗","PSTN_NO":"006"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP007","PSTN_NM":"清算岗","PSTN_NO":"007"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP008","PSTN_NM":"授权岗","PSTN_NO":"008"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP009","PSTN_NM":"授权主管11","PSTN_NO":"009"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP010","PSTN_NM":"理财经理","PSTN_NO":"010"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP011","PSTN_NM":"柜员","PSTN_NO":"011"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP012","PSTN_NM":"主办12222","PSTN_NO":"012"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP013","PSTN_NM":"总行操作员123","PSTN_NO":"013"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP014","PSTN_NM":"33","PSTN_NO":"014"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP015","PSTN_NM":"15678","PSTN_NO":"015"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP016","PSTN_NM":"1111","PSTN_NO":"016"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP017","PSTN_NM":"123","PSTN_NO":"017"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP222","PSTN_NM":"xxx","PSTN_NO":"222"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP223","PSTN_NM":"1111","PSTN_NO":"223"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP225","PSTN_NM":"111","PSTN_NO":"225"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP226","PSTN_NM":"11","PSTN_NO":"226"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP227","PSTN_NM":"测试227","PSTN_NO":"227"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP228","PSTN_NM":"测试228","PSTN_NO":"228"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP229","PSTN_NM":"测试229","PSTN_NO":"229"},{"PSTN_ID":"TEP230","PSTN_NM":"新增测试","PSTN_NO":"230"}]}"

查询公告信息

select SEQ_NO,ABST,ANNC_CONTENT,PRIT_CD,ANNC_STUS_CD,RELS_DT,RELS_TM,ANNC_TYP_CD,RCPTN_ORG_NO,RCPTN_PSTN_NO,SEND_TYP from IB_AUX_NOTICE_INFO where ABST like '%'||'%s'||'%' and PRIT_CD=decode('%s','',PRIT_CD,'%s') and ANNC_STUS_CD=decode('%s','',ANNC_STUS_CD,'%s') and RELS_DT like '%'||'%s'||'%' and ANNC_TYP_CD=decode('%s','',ANNC_TYP_CD,'%s') and RCPTN_ORG_NO like '%'||'%s'||'%' and ANNC_STUS_CD=decode('%s','',ANNC_STUS_CD,'%s') and RCPTN_PSTN_NO like '%'||'%s'||'%'

查询条件可为空，在IB_AUX_NOTICE_INFO表中查询

相关代码

getTradeQueryCondData() {
      return {
        _busidatakey_: "sel_noticeinfo",
        ABST: this.abst,
        PRIT_CD: this.pritCd,
        ANNC_STUS_CD: this.anncStusCd,
        RELS_DT: this.relsDt,
        ANNC_TYP_CD: this.anncTypCd,
        RCPTN_ORG_NO: this.rcptnOrgNo,
        RCPTN_PSTN_NO: this.rcptnPstnNo,
      };
    },

返回结果

Rslt: "{"PageNum":1,"totalNum":18,"TotNumOfPags":2,"Result":[{"SEND_TYP":"1","SEQ_NO":"20220119112030000100","RELS_DT":"20220119","ANNC_STUS_CD":"1","RCPTN_PSTN_NO":"TEP001,TEP002,TEP005,TEP006,TEP007,TEP008,TEP009,TEP010,TEP011,TEP012,TEP013,TEP014,TEP015,TEP016,TEP017,TEP222,TEP223,TEP225,TEP226,TEP227,TEP228,TEP229,TEP230","ANNC_CONTENT":"","RCPTN_ORG_NO":"2039","ABST":"测试公告","RELS_TM":"14:30","PRIT_CD":"1","ANNC_TYP_CD":"3"},{"SEND_TYP":"0","SEQ_NO":"20211215143807000005","RELS_DT":"20211215","ANNC_STUS_CD":"1","RCPTN_PSTN_NO":"TEP001","ANNC_CONTENT":"111","RCPTN_ORG_NO":"2039","ABST":"1","RELS_TM":"143807","PRIT_CD":"2","ANNC_TYP_CD":"1"},{"SEND_TYP":"0","SEQ_NO":"20200303161905000000","RELS_DT":"20200303","ANNC_STUS_CD":"1","RCPTN_PSTN_NO":"TEP001,TEP002,TEP005","ANNC_CONTENT":"柜外清功能使用","RCPTN_ORG_NO":"2039","ABST":"柜外清功能使用","RELS_TM":"161905","PRIT_CD":"1","ANNC_TYP_CD":"3"}]}"

新增、修改、删除

相关代码

async tradeComm() {
    let now;
      let result = await this.communication(ServicesNames.GETSERVERTIME,{
        Format:'yyyyMMddHHmmss'
      });
      if(result.isSuccess){
         now = result.data.Rslt;
      }
      let date = now.substring(0, 8);
      let time = now.substring(8, 14);
      let tData = {};
      if (this.dm.__ConfigInfo__.config_data.operType == "add") {
        tData._busidatakey_ = "insert_notice";
        //序号
        tData.SEQ_NO = now + this.sdm.UserInfo.userNum;
        //维护机构号
        tData.MATN_ORG_NO = this.sdm.BranchInfo.branchNum;
        //维护柜员号
        tData.MATN_TELR_NO = this.sdm.UserInfo.userNum;
        //维护日期
        tData.MATN_DT = date;
        //备注1
        tData.REMRK_1 = "0";
        //备注2
        tData.REMRK_2 = "";
        //备注3
        tData.REMRK_3 = "";
        //应用编号
        tData.APP_NO = "TE";
        if (this.sendType == "0") {
          tData.SEND_TYP = "0";
          tData.RELS_DT = date;
          tData.RELS_TM = time;
        } else if (this.sendType == "1") {
          tData.SEND_TYP = "1";
          tData.RELS_DT = this.relsDt;
          tData.RELS_TM = this.relsTm;
        }
        tData.ABST = this.abst;
        //标题
        tData.ANNC_CONTENT = this.annc_content;
        //内容
        tData.PRIT_CD = this.pritCd;
        //公告等级
        tData.ANNC_STUS_CD = "0";
        //发布状态
        tData.RCPTN_ORG_NO = this.rcptnOrgCheckedKeys;
        //所属机构
        tData.RCPTN_PSTN_NO = this.rcptnPstnCheckedKeys;
        //所属岗位
        tData.ANNC_TYP_CD = this.anncTypCd;
        //公告类型
      } else if (this.dm.__ConfigInfo__.config_data.operType == "modify") {
        tData._busidatakey_ = "upd_notice_seqno";
        //序号
        tData.SEQ_NO = this.seqNo;
        //发布日期
        tData.RELS_DT = this.relsDt;
        //时间
        tData.RELS_TM = this.relsTm;
        tData.ABST = this.abst;
        //标题
        tData.ANNC_CONTENT = this.annc_content;
        //内容
        tData.PRIT_CD = this.pritCd;
        //公告等级
        tData.ANNC_STUS_CD = "0";
        //发布状态
        tData.RCPTN_ORG_NO = this.rcptnOrgCheckedKeys;
        //所属机构
        tData.RCPTN_PSTN_NO = this.rcptnPstnCheckedKeys;
        //所属岗位
        tData.ANNC_TYP_CD = this.anncTypCd;
        //公告类型
      } else if (this.dm.__ConfigInfo__.config_data.operType == "delete") {
        tData._busidatakey_ = "del_notice_seqno";
        tData.SEQ_NO = this.seqNo;
      }
      let res = await this.communication(
        ServicesNames.DBCOMM,
        {
          CommCode: "DB",
          SceneCode: "DBComm",
          TradeData: JSON.stringify(tData),
        },
        false
      );
      if (res.isSuccess) {
      if(this.dm.__ConfigInfo__.config_data.operType != "delete"){
        await this.announcePublish();
      }
        return ResultInfo.successResult();
      } else {
        return ResultInfo.failResult();
      }
}

公告定时任务

select SEQ_NO,ABST,ANNC_CONTENT,PRIT_CD,ANNC_STUS_CD,RELS_DT,RELS_TM,ANNC_TYP_CD,RCPTN_ORG_NO,RCPTN_PSTN_NO from ib_aux_notice_info where ANNC_STUS_CD='0' AND (RELS_DT<? OR (RELS_DT=? AND RELS_TM <=?))

根据ANNC_STUS_CD(公告状态代码)、RELS_DT(发布日期)、RELS_TM(发布时间)在ib_aux_notice_info表中查询SEQ_NO(序号)、ABST(摘要)、ANNC_CONTENT(公告内容)、PRIT_CD(优先级代码)、ANNC_STUS_CD(公告状态代码)、RELS_DT(发布日期)、RELS_TM(发布时间)、ANNC_TYP_CD(公告类型代码)、RCPTN_ORG_NO(接收机构号)、RCPTN_PSTN_NO(接收岗位号)。

相关代码

async announcePublish() {
      let result = await this.communication(ServicesNames.ANNOUNCE, {});
      if (result.isSuccess) {
        this.info("公告发布成功");
        return;
      } else {
        this.info("公告发布失败");
        return;
      }
    }

公告提醒

代码位置： TEClientFM\activities\Home.vue

select a.SEQ_NO , a.ABST, a.ANNC_CONTENT,a.MATN_DT,(a.RELS_TM),a.PRIT_CD,a.MATN_DT effectivedate,a.RELS_DT expirydate,b.READ_FLG,a.REMRK_1,a.ANNC_TYP_CD from IB_AUX_NOTICE_INFO a,IB_AUX_NOTICEDERAIL_INFO b where b.RCPTN_ORG_NO ='%s' and  b.RECIVR_TELR_NO = '%s'   and a.SEQ_NO=b.SEQ_NO order by effectivedate DESC

根据IB_AUX_NOTICEDERAIL_INFO表中的RCPTN_ORG_NO(接收机构号)、RECIVR_TELR_NO(接收人柜员号)、SEQ_NO(序号)与IB_AUX_NOTICE_INFO表中的SEQ_NO(序号)查询IB_AUX_NOTICE_INFO表中的SEQ_NO(序号)、ABST(摘要)、ANNC_CONTENT(公告内容)、MATN_DT(维护日期)、RELS_TM(发布时间)、PRIT_CD(优先级代码)、RELS_DT(发布日期)、REMRK_1(备注1)、ANNC_TYP_CD(公告类型代码)与IB_AUX_NOTICEDERAIL_INFO表中的READ_FLG(已读标志)。

相关代码

async loadNoticeInfo() {
      let result_notice = await this.communication(
        ServicesNames.DBCOMM,
        {
          CommCode: "DB",
          SceneCode: "DBComm",
          TradeData: JSON.stringify({
            _busidatakey_: "loadNotice",
            BrahNum: this.sdm.BranchInfo.branchNum,
            Tlid: this.sdm.UserInfo.userNum,
          }),
        },
        false,
        false
      );
      if (!result_notice.isSuccess) {
      } else {
        this.NoticeList = JSON.parse(result_notice.data.Rslt).Result;
        this.$sendMessage(
          "@FM/modules/frame/InternalView/InternalServiceTrade.vue",
          {
            dataList: this.NoticeList,
            app: "NoticeInfo",
          }
        );
      }
    }

6.7 购物车

6.7.1 购物车设计说明

6.7.1.1 流程图

6.7.1.2 表结构

TE_SPC_SHOP_MARKET--场景超市表

字段名 Type 非空 缺省 注释
PRODT_CATEG_CD VARCHAR2(30) TRUE [NULL] 产品类别 1-综合签约 2-理财专区 3-开销户 4-存取款
PRODT_TYP_CD VARCHAR2(30) TRUE [NULL] 产品类型 11-综合签约 12-生活缴费 13-社会服务 14-理财类签约 21-理财 22-基金 23-保险 24-贵金属 25-债券 26-私募 31-开户类 32-销户类 41-活期存款 42-定期存款 43-特色存款
PRODT_NM VARCHAR2(50) TRUE [NULL] 产品名称
TX_CD VARCHAR2(10) TRUE [NULL] 产品交易码
PRODT_SPCLFETR_DESCR VARCHAR2(200) FALSE [NULL] 产品特色描述
PRODT_ICON VARCHAR2(30) FALSE [NULL] 产品图标
PRODT_STUS_CD VARCHAR2(2) FALSE [NULL] 产品状态 1-启用 2-停用
PTNSLE_DT VARCHAR2(8) FALSE [NULL] 上架时间
PTFSLE_DT VARCHAR2(8) FALSE [NULL] 下架时间
MUTEX_TX_CD VARCHAR2(200) FALSE [NULL] 互斥交易

TE_SPC_SHOP_LOG--购物车日志表

字段名 Type 非空 缺省 注释
UUID VARCHAR2(40) TRUE [NULL] 交易标识
TRAN_CD VARCHAR2(18) TRUE [NULL] 交易码
TRAN_NM VARCHAR2(64) TRUE [NULL] 交易名称
CUST_NO VARCHAR2(32) TRUE [NULL] 客户编号
CUST_NM VARCHAR2(32) TRUE [NULL] 客户名称
ACCT_NO VARCHAR2(32) FALSE [NULL] 账号
TX_AMT VARCHAR2(20) FALSE [NULL] 交易金额
CUR_CD VARCHAR2(3) FALSE [NULL] 币种
USER_NUM VARCHAR2(12) TRUE [NULL] 用户编号
TX_SN VARCHAR2(32) FALSE [NULL] 交易流水
PKG_SN VARCHAR2(32) FALSE [NULL] 包流水/订单号
SERV_SN VARCHAR2(32) TRUE [NULL] 服务流水号
STUS_CD VARCHAR2(1) FALSE [NULL] 状态编号 1-添加到购物车 2-加入订单 3-提交成功 4-提交失败
PWD VARCHAR2(32) FALSE [NULL] 密码
TX_DATA_INFO CLOB FALSE [NULL] 交易数据
REMRK VARCHAR2(256) FALSE [NULL] 备注
ADD_DT VARCHAR2(8) FALSE [NULL] 添加日期
ADD_TM VARCHAR2(6) FALSE [NULL] 添加时间
SUB_DT VARCHAR2(8) FALSE [NULL] 提交日期
SUB_TM VARCHAR2(6) FALSE [NULL] 提交时间

6.7.1.3 交易资源

工程名 资源路径 说明
TEClient TEClientTrade\modules\func\trade\market 场景超市交易目录
TEClient TEProject\common\utils\business\shop-utils.ts 购物车工具类
TEClient TEClientTrade\modules\func\trade\shop 购物车交易目录
agree-te-client src\impls\flow\trade-impl.ts 交易流程实现类
agree-te-client src\impls\flow\before-trade-submit-impl.ts 交易提交前接口实现类

6.7.1.4 重要代码说明

场景超市交易

  1. 开始服务后，已有客户服务流水，推荐交易中增加场景超市交易。此交易一般为固定的推荐交易，各市场可以自己设计场景超市的打开方式。
  2. 打开场景超市交易后，自动查询可加入场景超市的交易并展示
async mounted() {
    let marketData = await this.communication(
      ServicesNames.DBCOMM,
      {
        CommCode: "DB",
        SceneCode: "DBComm",
        TradeData: JSON.stringify({
          _busidatakey_: "quyShopMarket",
          PTNSLE_DT: this.sdm.AppInfo.acctountDate,
          PTFSLE_DT: this.sdm.AppInfo.acctountDate,
        }),
      },
      false,
      false
    );
    if (!marketData.isSuccess) {
      this.pushInfo("获取场景超市数据错误！");
      this.$exitTrade("product-market");
    }
    let market = JSON.parse(marketData.data.Rslt).Result;

    let marketG = _.groupBy(market, function (item) {
      return item.PRODT_CATEG_CD;
    });
    this.$refs["sign-up"].getShowData &&
      this.$refs["sign-up"].getShowData(marketG["1"]);
    this.$refs["manage-money"].getShowData &&
      this.$refs["manage-money"].getShowData(marketG["2"]);
    this.$refs["expense-account"].getShowData &&
      this.$refs["expense-account"].getShowData(marketG["3"]);
    this.$refs["access-money"].getShowData &&
      this.$refs["access-money"].getShowData(marketG["4"]);
    this.$refs["custom-info-manage"].getShowData &&
      this.$refs["custom-info-manage"].getShowData(marketG["5"]);
  }

3.点击购物车图标，可将交易加入到购物车中，并刷新框架底部状态栏购物车按钮的角标数值

点击购物车按钮触发增加交易到购物车的事件

TEClientTrade\modules\func\trade\market\TradeItem.vue

async addToShop() {
      this.showBall = true;
      if (!this.sdm.CustomerInfo.cstNum) {
        await this.pushInfo("请先开始服务");
        return;
      }
      let item = {
        // busiType:"存取款",
        // prodType:"存取款",
        prodName: this.name,
        tranCode: this.tranCode,
        istDate: this.sdm.AppInfo.acctountDate,
        istTime: DateUtils.getCurrentFormatTime("HHmmss"),
        mutexTrade: this.mutexTrade,
        // prodFeature:""
      };
      await ShopUtils.addShopData(this, item);
    },
  1. 添加购物车方法，添加到购物车前需要检查购物车是否互斥，互斥的交易不允许增加到购物车中
  2. 往购物车日志表里增加记录

TEProject\common\utils\business\shop-utils.ts

/**
     * 添加购物车
     * @param {*} shopData 
     */
    static async addShopData(trade: Vue, shopData: any) {
        //状态编号  1-添加到购物车 2-加入订单 3-提交成功 4-提交失败';
        //UUID,TRAN_CD,TRAN_NM,CUST_NO,CUST_NM,ACCT_NO,TX_AMT,CUR_CD,USER_NUM,TX_SN,PKG_SN,SERV_SN,
        //STUS_CD,PWD,TX_DATA_INFO,REMRK,ADD_DT,ADD_TM,SUB_DT,SUB_TM       
        //检查购物车互斥
        let vms = this.getVueCompByPath(trade, "@FM/activities/Home.vue");
        let shopCartData = [];
        if (vms && vms.length) {
            let home_vm = vms[0];
            let footer = home_vm.$refs['home-footer'];
            shopCartData = footer.shopCartData
        }
        if (!this.checkMutexTrade(trade, shopCartData, shopData)) {
            return;
        }
        shopData.UUID = RandomUtils.getUUID();
        let res = await trade.communication(ServicesNames.ADDSHOPDATA, {
            TradeData: JSON.stringify({
                UUID: shopData.UUID,
                TRAN_CD: shopData.tranCode,
                TRAN_NM: shopData.prodName,
                CUST_NO: trade.sdm.CustomerInfo.cstNum,
                CUST_NM: trade.sdm.CustomerInfo.cstNm,
                USER_NUM: trade.sdm.UserInfo.userNum,
                SERV_SN: trade.sdm.TradeSerialInfo.custServiceNo,
                STUS_CD: '1',
                ADD_DT: trade.sdm.AppInfo.acctountDate,
                ADD_TM: DateUtils.getCurrentFormatTime("HHmmss")
            })
        }, true, false)
        this.refreshShop(trade);


    }

 //检查互斥交易是否存在
    static checkMutexTrade(trade: Vue, shopCartData: any, addData: any) {
        for (let item of shopCartData) {
            if (item.MUTEX_TX_CD && item.MUTEX_TX_CD.indexOf(addData.tranCode) > -1) {
                trade.pushInfo("当前交易与购物车内[" + item.TRAN_CD + "]交易互斥，不能加入购物车")
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    }

4.点击购物车按钮打开购物车交易,勾选交易点击生成订单，系统自动按顺序打开交易

点击生成订单按钮后，显示TradeOrder.vue组件，组件mounted的时候建立单交易面板容器，用来打开交易

TEClientTrade\modules\func\trade\shop\App.vue

  1. createDd方法先将柜员选择的交易加到orders数组中，然后设置this.showShopping = false控制显示交易打开容器组件
  2. 交易打开方式设置为21--购物车经办打开
/**
     * @description: 创建订单
     * @param {*} cartData
     * @return {*}
     */
    async createDd(cartData) {
      for (let item of cartData) {
        let tradeItem = await TradeUtils.getTradeAttr(this, item.tranCode);
        if (!tradeItem) {
          this.pushInfo(item.prodName + "产品未配置交易信息");
          continue;
        }
        tradeItem.openType = "21"; //购物车经办打开
        tradeItem.UUID = item.UUID;
        this.orders.push(tradeItem);
      }
      if (this.orders.length < 1) {
        return;
      }
      this.showShopping = false;
    },

TEClientTrade\modules\func\trade\shop\TradeOrder.vue

交易打开容器上方是步骤条，显示购物车完成进度，下方是单交易面板容器，用来打开交易

<template>
  <div style="height: 100%; width: 100%">
    <fc-step :active="activeIndex" finish-status="success" class="step">
      <fc-step-item
        v-for="(item, index) in orders"
        :key="index"
        :title="item.TmpTradeName"
      ></fc-step-item>
    </fc-step>
    <single-panel
      ref="shopSinglePanel"
      data-focus-bound
      canRepeat
      @closePanel="handleClose"
    ></single-panel>
  </div>
</template>

初始化面板，并打开第一个交易

async mounted() {
    this.panelId = this.$refs.shopSinglePanel.initTarget(
      this.$getHost(),
      "shopSinglePanel"
    );
    //打开第一个交易
    await this.openTrade(this.activeIndex);
  },

5.正常做交易，完成交易后点击提交

src\impls\flow\trade-impl.ts

trade-impl实现类中，提交步骤与正常经办流程不同，只调用了交易页面覆写的tradePreSubmit方法，然后走beforeTradeSubmit.shopSubmit方法进行购物车提交

   case TradeOpenType.购物车办理:
                stepRes = await submitPage.tradePreSubmit();
                if (!stepRes.isSuccess) return stepRes;
                //购物车提交
                //@ts-ignore
                stepRes = await beforeTradeSubmit.shopSubmit(submitPage);
                if (!stepRes.isSuccess) return stepRes;
                break;

src\impls\flow\submit\before-trade-submit-impl.ts

购物车提交方法

注意事项

  1. 运营管控服务上送报文中startAuthProcess为2，代表不需要开启bpmn流程，只计算需要什么授权即可
  2. 修改购物车日志表本笔订单中该交易的状态。
  3. 发送本地消息给购物车交易增加提交数据
 async shopSubmit(trade: Vue, submitData?: any): Promise<ResultInfo<any>> {
        let shopData: any = {};
        shopData.trade = trade;
        shopData.tranName = (<TradeInfo>(trade.dm[TradeVars.TradeInfo])).tranCode ? (<TradeInfo>(trade.dm[TradeVars.TradeInfo])).tranName : "";
        shopData.tranCode = (<TradeInfo>(trade.dm[TradeVars.TradeInfo])).tranCode ? (<TradeInfo>(trade.dm[TradeVars.TradeInfo])).tranCode : "";
        shopData.tranFlow = trade.dm[TradeVars.TradeSerialInfo].tranFlowNo ? trade.dm[TradeVars.TradeSerialInfo].tranFlowNo : "";
        shopData.isPasswd = true;
        let tradedata = await RuleManager.getTradeData(trade);
        let tradejsondata = JSON.stringify(tradedata);
        shopData.tradeData = tradejsondata;
        //查询运营管控信息
        let rule_result = await ManagerUtils.getManagerServices().communication(
            trade,
            ServicesNames.GETRULECHKRSLT,
            {
                RuleLocate: "1",
                TranCode: (<TradeInfo>(trade.dm[TradeVars.TradeInfo])).tranCode,
                TranNm: (<TradeInfo>(trade.dm[TradeVars.TradeInfo])).tranName,
                LegalPersonNum: (<LegalInfo>(trade.sdm.LegalInfo)).legalPersonNum,
                BranchLevel: (<BranchInfo>(trade.sdm.BranchInfo)).branchLevel,
                BranchAttr: (<BranchInfo>(trade.sdm.BranchInfo)).branchAttr,
                TlrCstNum: (<UserInfo>(trade.sdm.UserInfo)).userCstNum,
                BranchNum: (<BranchInfo>(trade.sdm.BranchInfo)).branchNum,
                UserNum: (<UserInfo>(trade.sdm.UserInfo)).userNum,
                TradeData: tradejsondata,
                AppNum: "TE",
                startAuthProcess: '2'//购物车提交不需要开启bpmn授权流程 1-开启 2-不开启
            }
        );

        if (rule_result.data.DS && rule_result.data.DS === "true") {
            //双屏数据
            shopData.screenData = {};
        } else {
            shopData.screenData = {};
        }
        if (rule_result.data.AU && rule_result.data.AU === "true") {
            //授权数据
            shopData.authData = JSON.parse(rule_result.data.AuthInfo);
        } else {
            shopData.authData = {};
        }
        //客户数据
        shopData.cstData = {
            //@ts-ignore
            CustomInfo: trade.$getSdmObject('CustomerInfo'),
            //@ts-ignore
            AgentInfo: trade.$getSdmObject('AgentInfo'),
        }
        //客户号
        shopData.cstNum = (<CustomerInfo>(trade.sdm.CustomerInfo)).cstNum;
        shopData.cstNm = (<CustomerInfo>(trade.sdm.CustomerInfo)).cstNm;
        shopData.pubData = await shopSubmit.getPubData(trade);
        shopData.UUID = trade.$getTradeImportVar().UUID;

        //交易信息
        await ManagerUtils.getManagerServices().communication(
            trade,
            ServicesNames.DBCOMM,
            {
                TradeData: JSON.stringify({
                    _busidatakey_: 'updShopLog',
                    UUID: shopData.UUID,
                    ACCT_NO: shopData.pubData.AcNum,
                    TX_AMT: shopData.pubData.AmtOfMny,
                    CUR_CD: shopData.pubData.Ccy,
                    TX_SN: shopData.tranFlow,
                    STUS_CD: '2',
                    TX_DATA_INFO: JSON.stringify(tradejsondata)
                })
            }, false, false);
        //给购物车交易增加提交数据
        trade.$sendMessage("@TETrade/modules/func/trade/shop/App.vue", {
            app: "submitDatas",
            msg: shopData,
            type: "local",
        }, false);
        return ResultInfo.successResult();
    }

6.所有交易预提交完成

TEClientTrade\modules\func\trade\shop\TradeOrder.vue

所有交易预提交完成后，调用submitOrder提交订单

   /**
     * @description: 购物车统一提交
     * @param {*}
     * @return {*}
     */
    async submitOrder() {
      //所有交易预提交完成，进行购物车统一提交
      let orderData = await ShopUtils.submitOrder(
        this,
        this.$parent.submitDatas
      );
      //订单提交
      this.$emit("submit", orderData);
    },

TEProject\common\utils\business\shop-utils.ts

提交订单方法注意点

  1. 提交订单前进行统一验密，一个订单中一个账号办理多笔业务只用输入一次密码。
  2. 统一授权，根据bpmn流程进行授权，预提交的时候只是计算了交易需要什么授权，并未开启实际的授权流程
  3. 根据预提交时每笔交易运营管控接口返回的授权数据，判断每笔交易需要走什么授权。若多笔交易都存在本地授权，则所有交易的本地授权合并成一笔，一次通过。
  4. 若所有交易中存在非本地类型的授权，则每笔交易的授权单独发起，不会合并。所有类型授权的顺序按照bpmn的编排进行。例如bpmn规定所有类型的授权顺序为A>B>C,则先执行完所有交易的A授权再执行完所有交易的B授权最后执行所有交易的C授权
  5. 统一授权完成后调用交易的tradeComm方法进行交易提交。提交成功后进行交易打印等后续操作
  6. 提交后更改购物车日志表中的状态。
//**提交订单 */
    static async submitOrder(trade: Vue, orderSubmitData: any) {
        let vms = this.getVueCompByPath(trade, "@FM/activities/Home.vue");
        let footer: any = undefined;
        if (vms && vms.length) {
            let home_vm = vms[0];
            footer = home_vm.$refs['home-footer'];
        }
        if (!footer) return
        //根据客户分组 但是一次订单的提交最好是同一个客户
        //统一验密 目前所有的购物车都需要验密 需要配置时在根据需求添加 密码的上送再说 目前密码统一输入 000000
        let checkPwdRes = await this.checkPwd(trade, orderSubmitData[0].cstNm);
        if (!checkPwdRes) return;//验证失败
        //统一收费
        let feeRes = await this.fee(trade, orderSubmitData);
        if (!feeRes) return;
        // //统一授权
        let authRes = await this.auth(trade, orderSubmitData);
        trade.info("授权结果", authRes)
        //所有交易授权都失败才return
        let isAllFail = true;
        let index = 0;
        for (let item of authRes) {
            orderSubmitData[index].authRes = item//保留授权结果
            if (item.isSuccess) {
                isAllFail = false;
            }
            index++
        }
        if (isAllFail) return;
        //授权成功的交易核心提交 并且保存打印数据到打印池
        let busiSteps = [];
        let amt = '0';
        let orderNo = 'D' + DateUtils.getCurrentFormatTime('yyyyMMddHHmmss');//订单号
        let status = 'success';
        let failList = [];
        for (let item of orderSubmitData) {
            // 暂时不考虑提交失败的交易
            let res: ResultInfo<any>
            if (item.authRes.isSuccess) {
                item.trade.dm.__TradeSerialInfo__.pkgSerialNo = orderNo;
                res = await item.trade.tradeComm();
            } else {
                trade.error(item.tranName, "交易授权未成功，不进行核心提交");
                res = ResultInfo.failResult("Auth005", '授权不通过')
            }

            if (!res.isSuccess) {
                status = 'fail'
                busiSteps.push({
                    name: item.tranName,
                    status: 'fail'
                })
                failList.push({
                    tranCode: item.tranCode,
                    tranName: item.tranName,
                    failReason: res.message
                })
                await trade.communication(ServicesNames.DBCOMM, {
                    CommCode: 'DB',
                    SceneCode: 'DBComm',
                    TradeData: JSON.stringify({
                        _busidatakey_: 'updShopLog',
                        UUID: item.UUID,
                        STUS_CD: '4',
                        PKG_SN: orderNo,
                        SUB_DT: DateUtils.getCurrentFormatTime("yyyyMMdd"),
                        SUB_TM: DateUtils.getCurrentFormatTime("HHmmss")
                    })
                }, false, false);
            } else {
                let afterTradeSubmit = FlowUtils.getAfterTradeSubmit();
                //交易打印
                await afterTradeSubmit.printTradeData(item.trade);
                //拼装订单流数据
                busiSteps.push({
                    name: item.tranName,
                    status: 'success'
                })
                //更新购物车数据状态
                await trade.communication(ServicesNames.DBCOMM, {
                    CommCode: 'DB',
                    SceneCode: 'DBComm',
                    TradeData: JSON.stringify({
                        _busidatakey_: 'updShopLog',
                        UUID: item.UUID,
                        STUS_CD: '3',
                        PKG_SN: orderNo,
                        SUB_DT: DateUtils.getCurrentFormatTime("yyyyMMdd"),
                        SUB_TM: DateUtils.getCurrentFormatTime("HHmmss")
                    })
                }, false, false);
            }
            let index_footer = -1;

            for (let m = 0; m < footer.shopCartData.length; m++) {
                let o = footer.shopCartData[m]
                if (o.UUID == item.UUID) {
                    index_footer = m
                    break;
                }
            }
            if (index_footer > -1) {
                footer.shopCartData.splice(index_footer, 1);
            }
            //拼装交易金额
            if (item.pubData && item.pubData.AmtOfMny) {
                amt = StringUtils.addBigDecimal(amt, item.pubData.AmtOfMny)
            }
        }
        //拼装订单数据
        return {
            orderNo: orderNo,//订单号
            submitTime: DateUtils.getCurrentFormatTime("yyyyMMdd HH:mm:ss"),
            amt: amt,
            status: status,
            busiSteps: busiSteps,
            failList: failList
        }
    }

7.父页面监听到TradeOrder提交的submit事件，处理相关数据，并展示订单界面。

TEClientTrade\modules\func\trade\shop\App.vue

    /**
     * @description: 订单提交
     * @param {*} orderData
     * @return {*}
     */
    handleOrderSubmit(orderData) {
      if (!orderData) return;
      //隐藏交易提交界面 切换到订单界面
      this.showShopping = true;
      this.activeIndex = "completeOrder";
      //删除保存的交易提交数据 后面添加重新办理时 将数据入库
      this.submitDatas.splice(0);
      //删除已提交订单
      this.orders.splice(0);
      //删除已提交的购物车数据
      this.$refs["shop-list"].refresh();
      //展示订单界面
      this.$refs["complete-order"].addOrderData(orderData);
    },

8.«7-购物车/赞同传统柜面详细设计说明书-场景超市产品维护交易.docx»
下载赞同传统柜面详细设计说明书-场景超市产品维护交易

6.8 客户视图

6.8.1 客户视图说明文档

6.8.1.1 资源路径

文件路径 说明
TEClientFM\modules\frame\CustomerView\CustomerServiceView.vue 对客服务视图页面，客户视图就在对客服务视图左侧
TEClientFM\activities\components\customer-service\BeforeService.vue 开始服务之前
TEClientFM\activities\components\customer-service\OnService.vue 正在服务页面
TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\before-service\BindWindow.vue 绑定窗口弹窗页面
TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\before-service\EnterCstInfo.vue 录入客户信息
TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\before-service\AppointCall.vue 指定叫号界面
TEClientFM\modules\shared\ui-libs\cust\InputCustInfo.vue 读取证件界面
TEClientFM\modules\shared\ui-libs\cust\InputAccInfo.vue 读取账户界面
TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\ShowCstInfoPersonage.vue 个人客户客户信息
TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\ShowCstInfoPub.vue 对公客户客户信息
TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\BankCard.vue 介质信息组件
TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\UniPrint.vue 统一打印组件
TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\ShowCstTip.vue 客户提醒组件
TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\EnterAgentInfo.vue 录入代理人信息组件
TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\AgentInfoShow.vue 显示代理人信息组件
TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\AccountListInfo.vue 账户列表组件
TEClientFM\modules\shared\ui-libs\cust\InputSubAccInfo.vue 子账户列表

6.8.1.2 组件说明

6.8.1.2.1 CustomerServiceView.vue

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\CustomerView\CustomerServiceView.vue

描述：对客服务视图主界面

  1. 如下图代码所示，客户视图展示在对客服务视图左侧，通过showBeforeService标志切换beforeService(开始服务前组件)和onService(服务中组件)两个组件的显示隐藏。
  2. 默认展示beforeService组件
<template>
  <div class="customer-service">
    <fc-row class="tradeview">
      <!-- 客户视图 -->
      <fc-col
        :class="{
          'custom-side': true,
          'show-side': showCstSide,
          'hide-side': !showCstSide,
        }"
      >
        <div class="custom-service">
          <!-- 客户信息展示，代理信息 -->
          <div v-if="!showBeforeService" class="side-left-on">
            <on-service
              ref="on_service"
              :cstInfo="cstInfo"
              :mediaInfo="mediaInfo"
              @showEnterCst="handleShowEnterCst"
              @end-service="handleEndService"
            ></on-service>
          </div>
          <!-- 客户服务前 叫号/录入/业务信息展示 -->
          <div class="side-left-before" v-else>
            <before-service
              ref="before_service"
              :showType="showBeforeServiceType"
            ></before-service>
          </div>
        </div>
      </fc-col>
      <div
        :class="{
          'side-btn': true,
          'show-side-btn': showCstSide,
          'hide-side-btn': !showCstSide,
        }"
        @click="showCstSide = !showCstSide"
      ></div>
      <!-- 交易面板容器 -->
      <fc-col class="trade-side">
        <multiple-panel
          ref="trade-panel_csttom"
          class="trade-showcase"
          data-focus-bound
          :canRepeat="false"
          :maxTradeSize="10"
        ></multiple-panel>
      </fc-col>
    </fc-row>
  </div>
</template>

如下图为客户视图未开始服务的状态

  1. 该组件进入后建立刷新左侧客户信息和刷新左侧介质信息事件监听，监听到客户信息和介质信息变化后执行对应方法
mounted() {
    this.regHotkey();
    this.panelId = this.$refs["trade-panel_csttom"].initTarget(
      this.$getHost(),
      "customerPanel"
    );
    // 打开客户服务中心，并不可关闭
    this.$asyncOpenTrade(
      "@FM/modules/frame/customer-view/CustomerServiceTrade.vue",
      "首页",
      "customerPanel",
      null,
      { showClose: false }
    );
    EventBus.$on(EVENT_BUS_NAME.刷新左侧客户信息, this.refreshCstInfo);
    EventBus.$on(EVENT_BUS_NAME.刷新左侧介质信息, this.refreshMediaInfo);
  },

  1. refreshCstInfo刷新客户信息，并切换视图到onService。将刷新左侧客户信息事件传过来的客户信息传入onService组件

      /**
     * 刷新客户信息显示
     */
    refreshCstInfo(cstInfo) {
      //服务流水为空时生成服务流水
      if (!this.sdm.TradeSerialInfo.custServiceNo) {
        this.dm.canSetSDM = true;
        let temp = DateUtils.getCurrentFormatTime("yyyyMMddHHmmss");
        this.sdm.TradeSerialInfo.custServiceNo =
          "SV" + this.sdm.UserInfo.userNum + temp;
        this.dm._startServiceTime = DateUtils.getCurrentTime();
        this.info(
          "开始服务设置服务流水:" + this.sdm.TradeSerialInfo.custServiceNo
        );
      }
      this.showBeforeService = false;
      this.cstInfo = cstInfo;
    },

  2. refreshMediaInfo刷新介质信息，并切换视图到onService。将刷新左侧介质信息事件传过来的介质信息传入onService组件

    refreshMediaInfo(mediaInfo) {
      this.showBeforeService = false;
      this.mediaInfo = mediaInfo;
    },

  3. 监听sdm中介质信息账号改变之后自动刷新左侧的介质信息

      watch: {
    "sdm.MediaInfo.accNum"(){
      this.info("刷新左侧客户介质信息");
      EventBus.$emit(EVENT_BUS_NAME.刷新左侧介质信息,this.$getSdmObject("MediaInfo"))
    },
    ...
  }

    1. 结束服务--切换视图到软叫号，并关闭对客服务视图所有打开的交易

        /**
     * 结束服务
     */
    handleEndService(){
      this.showBeforeService = true;
      this.showBeforeServiceType = "softcall";
      this.$refs["trade-panel_csttom"].removeAll([
              "@FM/modules/frame/customer-view/CustomerServiceTrade.vue",
            ]);
    },
6.8.1.2.2 BeforeService.vue

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\BeforeService.vue

描述：开始服务前组件

  1. BeforeService页面也分三部分。其中softCall(软叫号)，enterCstInfo(录入客户信息)，通过showSoftCall标志显示两个组件的显隐。
  2. serviceInfo组件为服务信息展示组件
  3. softCall，enterCstInfo默认展示softCall组件。serviceInfo必展示
<template>
  <div class="before">
    <!-- 软叫号界面 绑定窗口时展示 -->
    <div class="before-top">
      <soft-call
        v-show="showSoftCall"
        @showEnterCst="showSoftCall = !showSoftCall"
        @baffle="showBaffle"
        ref="softcall"
      ></soft-call>
      <!-- 手工录入界面 -->
      <enter-cst-info
        v-show="!showSoftCall"
        ref="enterCstInfo"
        @showSoftCall="showSoftCall = !showSoftCall"
      ></enter-cst-info>
    </div>
    <!-- 服务信息展示 -->
    <service-info></service-info>
  </div>
</template>
6.8.1.2.3 SoftCall

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\before-service\SoftCall.vue

描述：软叫号组件

  1. 进入客户视图后默认展示软叫号界面
  2. 可点击设置按钮查询可绑定的窗口列表，查询成功后打开窗口绑定弹窗，柜员可选择窗口进行绑定。绑定成功后查询该窗口的等待人数，并将人数保存在sdm.QueueInfo.queueWaitNum中
  async windowQuery() {
      if (
        this.sdm.AppInfo.analogFlag &&
        this.sdm.AppInfo.analogFlag.startsWith("2")
      ) {
        this.WinList.push({
          label: "1" + this.$t("号窗口"),
          value: "1",
        });
        this.WinList.push({
          label: "2" + this.$t("号窗口"),
          value: "2",
        });
        this.WinList.push({
          label: "3" + this.$t("号窗口"),
          value: "3",
        });
        this.WinList.push({
          label: "4" + this.$t("号窗口"),
          value: "4",
        });
        return;
      }
      let result_win = await this.communication(ServicesNames.AFACOMM, {
        TradeData: JSON.stringify({
          Brno: "34150999", //厅堂测试写死
        }),
        AfaTranCode: "CQMS_Q408",
      });
      if (result_win.isSuccess) {
        this.WinList.splice(0);
        let rslt = JSON.parse(result_win.data.AfaTranRslt).RSP_BODY;
        for (let win of rslt.WinList) {
          this.WinList.push({
            label: win.WinNo + this.$t("号窗口"),
            value: win.WinNo,
          });
        }
        //打开绑定窗口弹窗
        let BindWindowRes = await this.$openPanel(
          "@FM/modules/frame/customer-view/customer-service/before-service/BindWindow.vue",
          "绑定窗口",
          "window",
          {
            winList: this.WinList,
          }
        );
        this.info("绑定窗口结果", BindWindowRes);
        if (BindWindowRes && BindWindowRes.winNo)
          //查询等待人数
          this.quyWaitNum();
      }
    },

  1. 柜员可点击呼叫按钮进行顺呼，或点击指定叫号按钮指定排队号叫号。在顺呼或指定叫号之前会先校验是否绑定窗口，如果未绑定窗口，则先弹窗绑定窗口。顺呼需要检查顺呼间隔时间不能过短。顺呼或指定叫号成功后均需要查询等待人数。

    如下代码分别是顺呼和指定叫号代码

     /**
     * 下一位
     */
    async nextCall() {
      if (!this.canNext) {
        return;
      }
      if (!this.sdm.QueueInfo.winNo) {
        this.windowQuery();
        return;
      }
      // 重呼时间戳，若有值，则进行重呼间隔判断
      if (this.callTimeStamp) {
        // 两次重呼之间间隔小于设定值
        if (
          new Date().getTime() - this.callTimeStamp <
          this.callNextLmtTime * 1000
        ) {
          this.pushInfo("顺呼间隔过短，请稍后操作");
          return;
        } else {
          this.callTimeStamp = new Date().getTime();
        }
      } else {
        this.callTimeStamp = new Date().getTime();
      }
      let result_shunHu = await this.communication(
        ServicesNames.AFACOMM,
        {
          TradeData: JSON.stringify({
            Brno: "34150999",
            WinNo: this.sdm.QueueInfo.winNo,
          }),
          AfaTranCode: "CQMS_Q201",
        },
        true
      );
      if (result_shunHu.isSuccess) {
        let rslt = JSON.parse(result_shunHu.data.AfaTranRslt).RSP_BODY;
        console.log(rslt);
        this.info("叫号结果：", rslt);
        this.sdm.QueueInfo.queueNo = rslt.QueueNo;
        this.QueNo = rslt.QueueNo;
        this.BillNo = rslt.BillNo;
        this.pdjCstInfo = {
          ctfTp: rslt.IDType,
          ctfNum: rslt.IDCode,
          cstNum: rslt.CustNo,
          cstNm: rslt.CustName,
          ctfPhoto: rslt.CustPhoto,
        };
        //营销意愿查询
        this.quyCstWish(rslt.IDCode);
      }

      this.quyWaitNum();
    },

        /**
     * 指定叫号
     */
    async appointCall() {
      //指定叫号
      if (!this.sdm.QueueInfo.winNo) {
        this.windowQuery();
        return;
      }
      //打开弹窗
      let appointCallRes = await this.$openPanel(
        "@FM/modules/frame/customer-view/customer-service/before-service/AppointCall.vue",
        "指定叫号",
        "window",
        null
      );
      this.info("指定叫号结果:", appointCallRes);
      if (appointCallRes) {
        this.QueNo = appointCallRes.QueNo;
        this.BillNo = appointCallRes.BillNo;
        this.pdjCstInfo = appointCallRes.customerInfo;
        this.quyCstWish(appointCallRes.customerInfo.ctfNum);
      }
      this.quyWaitNum();
    },

  2. 可点击重呼按钮进行重呼，需检查重呼间隔时间不能过短。重呼成功后查询等待人数

       /**
     * 重呼
     */
    async reCall() {
      // 重呼时间戳，若有值，则进行重呼间隔判断
      if (this.callTimeStamp) {
        // 两次重呼之间间隔小于设定值
        if (
          new Date().getTime() - this.callTimeStamp <
          this.recallLmtTime * 1000
        ) {
          this.pushInfo("TEC178");
          return;
        } else {
          this.callTimeStamp = new Date().getTime();
        }
      } else {
        this.callTimeStamp = new Date().getTime();
      }
      let result_recall = await this.communication(ServicesNames.AFACOMM, {
        TradeData: JSON.stringify({
          Brno: "34150999",
          WinNo: this.sdm.QueueInfo.winNo,
          QueueNo: this.QueNo,
        }),
        AfaTranCode: "CQMS_Q202",
      });
      if (result_recall.isSuccess) {
        let rslt = JSON.parse(result_recall.data.AfaTranRslt).RSP_BODY;
        this.info("重呼结果:", rslt);
        this.sdm.QueueInfo.queueNo = rslt.QueueNo;
        this.QueNo = rslt.QueueNo;
        this.BillNo = rslt.BillNo;
        this.pdjCstInfo = {
          ctfTp: rslt.IDType,
          ctfNum: rslt.IDCode,
          cstNum: rslt.CustNo,
          cstNm: rslt.CustName,
        };
      }
      this.quyWaitNum();
    },

    1. 呼叫成功后可点击开始服务，向EventBus提交刷新客户信息事件。CustomerServiceView页面监听到需要刷新左侧客户信息，则切换显示onService组件。若未呼叫直接点击开始服务，则向父组件BeforeService提交showEnterCst事件，BeforeService切换到enterCstInfo--录入客户信息组件

        /**
     * 开始服务, 此处生成服务流水
     * 叫号后，如果厅堂排队系统已识别客户信息或账户信息，
     * 则在客户视图中展示客户信息及账户信息，但不作为业务办理的数据。
     * 可以点击“开始服务”进行柜面客户识别。
     */
    startService() {
      //设置服务流水
      this.dm.canSetSDM = true;
      let temp = DateUtils.getCurrentFormatTime('yyyyMMddHHmmss');
      this.sdm.TradeSerialInfo.custServiceNo = "SV" + this.sdm.UserInfo.userNum + temp;
      this.dm._startServiceTime = DateUtils.getCurrentTime()
      this.info("开始服务设置服务流水:" + this.sdm.TradeSerialInfo.custServiceNo);

      this.preorderSheet(this.QueNo);
      if (this.QueNo == "P0001") {
        this.$emit("baffle", {
          //挡板
          order: "P0001",
        });
        return;
      }
      if (!this.pdjCstInfo.ctfTp || !this.pdjCstInfo.ctfNum) {
        //如果没有证件号码和证件号，则打开客户信息录入
        this.$emit("showEnterCst"); //
      } else {
        /**
         * 展示排队机信息
         * 叫号后，如果厅堂排队系统已识别客户信息或账户信息，
         * 则在客户视图中展示客户信息及账户信息，但不作为业务办理的数据。
         * 可以点击“开始服务”进行柜面客户识别
         */
        this.pdjCstInfo.isQueue = true
        EventBus.$emit(EVENT_BUS_NAME.刷新左侧客户信息,this.pdjCstInfo)
      }
    },

    2. 其他功能如暂停服务、呼叫大堂经理等功能不再赘述，自己看吧

6.8.1.2.4 BindWindow

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\before-service\BindWindow.vue

6.8.1.2.5 AppointCall

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\before-service\AppointCall.vue

6.8.1.2.6 EnterCstInfo

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\before-service\EnterCstInfo.vue

  1. 点击不同的按钮调用相应外设，读取客户信息

  2. 读取到客户信息后向EventBus注册刷新左侧客户信息事件，CustomerServiceView组件监听到刷新左侧客户信息事件之后展示onService

  3. 如果刷账户获取的客户信息，则还需要向EventBus注册刷新左侧介质信息事件

    async enterCstInfo(type) {
      //打开读卡弹窗
      let res;
      if (type === "1") {
        res = await this.$openPanel(
          "@FM/modules/shared/ui-libs/cust/InputCustInfo.vue",
          "客户信息录入",
          "window",
          {
            syncSdmFlg: true,
          }
        );
      } else {
        res = await this.$openPanel(
          "@FM/modules/shared/ui-libs/cust/InputAccInfo.vue",
          "客户账户信息采集",
          "window",
          {
            readType: "1",
            syncSdmFlg: true,
            fromCustView: true,
            S1: true,
            S2: true,
            S3: true,
            S4: true,
            S5: false,
            S6: true,
            S7: false, //交易子账户列表获取模式 false-无需选择子账户
          },
          {}
        );
      }
      //存在客户信息时刷新客户信息
      if (res && res.data && res.data.cstJbInfo) {
        EventBus.$emit(EVENT_BUS_NAME.刷新左侧客户信息,  this.$getSdmObject('CustomerInfo'));
      }
      if (res && res.data && (!StringUtils.isEmpty(res.data.accountInfo) || !StringUtils.isEmpty(res.data.subAccInfo))) {
        EventBus.$emit(EVENT_BUS_NAME.刷新左侧介质信息, this.$getSdmObject('MediaInfo'));
      }
    },
6.8.1.2.7 InputCustInfo

路径：TEClientFM\modules\shared\ui-libs\cust\InputCustInfo.vue

6.8.1.2.8 InputAccInfo

路径：TEClientFM\modules\shared\ui-libs\cust\InputAccInfo.vue

6.8.1.2.9 ServiceInfo

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\before-service\ServiceInfo.vue

6.8.1.2.10 OnService

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\OnService.vue

描述：服务中界面

  1. 包含组件：showCstInfoPersonage--个人客户视图 showCstInfoPub--对公客户视图 bankCard--银行卡组件 AgentInfoShow--显示代理人组件 ShowCstTip--客户提醒组件

  2. 识别叫号或录入客户信息得到的客户信息，如果是个人客户，则展示showCstInfoPersonage，对公客户展示showCstInfoPub

  3. 代理人和客户提醒都在onService组件内的下方，通过fc-tab组件切换这两个组件的显隐。

  4. 若无代理人信息，则AgentInfoShow组件不显示，通过点击录入代理人信息按钮，打开弹窗EnterAgentInfo组件录入代理人信息。录入代理人信息后需要把代理人信息保存在sdm.AgentInfo中

    /**
     * 录入代理信息
     */
    async enterAgent() {
      let agentInfo = await this.$openPanel(
        "@FM/modules/frame/customer-view/customer-service/on-service/EnterAgentInfo.vue",
        this.AgentLabel,
        "window",
        {},
        { showClose: false }
      );
      if (agentInfo) {
        this.dm.canSetSDM = true;
        this.sdm.AgentInfo.ctfName = agentInfo.ctfName;
        this.sdm.AgentInfo.ctfNum = agentInfo.ctfNum;
        this.sdm.AgentInfo.ctfType = agentInfo.ctfTp;
        this.sdm.AgentInfo.nationality = agentInfo.nationality;
        this.sdm.AgentInfo.phoneNum = agentInfo.phoneNum;
        this.sdm.AgentInfo.agentMark = true;
        this.sdm.AgentInfo.chkState = false;
        this.handelShowAgent(agentInfo);
      }
    },

  5. 结束服务可点击服务结束按钮。服务结束前先查询待打印任务，如果有待打印任务则先进行统一打印。统一打印完成后发起客户评价。然后插入服务流水，清空服务流水号、清空sdm中的客户信息、介质信息、代理人信息等，刷新智能推荐交易，然后提交结束服务事件给CustomerServiceView

    async endService() {
      //TODO判断是否有待打印未打印的任务
      let res = await this.communication(
        ServicesNames.DBCOMM,
        {
          CommCode: "DB",
          SceneCode: "DBComm",
          TradeData: JSON.stringify({
            _busidatakey_: "QyUniPrint",
            ServiceNo: this.sdm.TradeSerialInfo.custServiceNo,
            // ServiceNo: "SV00000620210914095526",
            TRANDATE: this.sdm.AppInfo.acctountDate,
          }),
        },
        false,
        false
      );
      if (res.isSuccess) {
        await this.pushInfo("存在待打印的数据，请先打印");
        this.waitToPrint();
      }
      //评价
      await this.communication(
        ServicesNames.AFACOMM,
        {
          TradeData: JSON.stringify({
            AppRayseChannel: "TE",
            Brno: "34150999",
            TellerNum: this.sdm.UserInfo.userNum,
            WinNo: this.sdm.QueueInfo.winNo,
            QueueNo: this.sdm.QueueInfo.queueNo,
            Eval: "3", //固定不满意
            RaiseType: "",
            RaiseContent: "",
            TradeCode: "",
            TradeName: "",
            CusidenType: this.sdm.CustomerInfo.ctfTp,
            CusIdentNo: this.sdm.CustomerInfo.ctfNum,
            CustermNo: this.sdm.CustomerInfo.cstNum,
            CusName: this.sdm.CustomerInfo.cstNm,
          }),
          AfaTranCode: "CES_E001",
        },
        false
      );
      //插入服务流水
      await this.communication(
        ServicesNames.DBCOMM,
        {
          CommCode: "DB",
          SceneCode: "DBComm",
          TradeData: JSON.stringify({
            _busidatakey_: "insert_CUSTSVCTRK_LOG",
            CUST_SN: this.sdm.TradeSerialInfo.custServiceNo,
            TX_DT: DateUtils.getCurrentDate(),
            CUST_NO: this.sdm.CustomerInfo.cstNum,
            CUST_NM: this.sdm.CustomerInfo.cstNm,
            CRTF_TYP_CD: this.sdm.CustomerInfo.ctfTp,
            CRTF_NO: this.sdm.CustomerInfo.ctfNum,
            MOBILE_NO: this.sdm.CustomerInfo.phoneNum,
            QUNG_SEQ_NO: this.sdm.QueueInfo.queueNo,
            SERV_BGN_TM: this.dm.startServiceTime || DateUtils.getCurrentTime(),
            SERV_END_TM: DateUtils.getCurrentTime(),
            CUST_TYP_CD: this.sdm.CustomerInfo.cstTp,
            USER_NO: this.sdm.UserInfo.userNum,
            ORG_NO: this.sdm.BranchInfo.branchNum,
            LPR_NO: this.sdm.LegalInfo.legalPersonNum,
            CUST_ASSIS_CRTF_IMG_BTCHNO: "",
            CUST_APRS_CONTENT: "",
          }),
        },
        false,
        false
      );
      this.$resetSDM("CstCheckInfo", new CstCheckInfo());
      this.$resetSDM("CustomerInfo", new CustomerInfo());
      this.$resetSDM("AgentInfo", new AgentInfo());
      this.$resetSDM("AgentCheckInfo", new AgentCheckInfo());
      this.$resetSDM("MediaInfo", new MediaInfo());
      this.$resetSDM("CstLegalPersonInfo", new CstLegalPersonInfo());
      this.$resetSDM("CstActualControllerInfo", new CstActualControllerInfo());
      //清空服务流水号
      this.sdm.TradeSerialInfo.custServiceNo = "";
      //清空排队号
      await this.communication(
        ServicesNames.AFACOMM,
        {
          TradeData: JSON.stringify({
            // Brno: StorageManager.getStore(StorageName.TellerInfo.BranchNum),
            Brno: "34150999",
            WinNo: this.sdm.QueueInfo.winNo,
            QueueNo: this.sdm.QueueInfo.queueNo,
          }),
          AfaTranCode: "CQ_SVCICEEND",
        },
        false,
        false
      );
      this.sdm.QueueInfo.queueNo = "";
      //刷新智能推荐交易
      this.$sendMessage(
        "@FM/modules/frame/customer-view/CustomerServiceTrade.vue",
        {
          app: "mind",
          msg: "获取智能推荐交易",
        }
      );
      this.$emit("end-service");
    },
6.8.1.2.11 ShowCstInfoPersonage

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\ShowCstInfoPersonage.vue

描述：个人客户信息

  1. 进入页面首先检查客户是否是未成年人
  2. this.cstInfo为父组件传入的客户信息，调用setShowInfo方法对客户信息进行处理
  3. 页面绑定setShowInfo方法处理后的客户信息，显示客户信息
  mounted() {
    this.dm.canSetSDM = true;
    //未成年必须要监护人代理
    if (this.sdm.CustomerInfo && this.sdm.CustomerInfo.isUnderAge == "0") {
      this.agentDisabled = true;
      this.agentFlag = true;
      this.changeAgentMode();
    }
    //设置显示数据
    this.setShowInfo(this.cstInfo);
  },

 setShowInfo(cstInfo) {
      this.showInfo = {
        cstNm: getShowInfoItem(cstInfo.cstNm),
        cstGender: getShowInfoCombo(cstInfo.cstGender, sex),
        ctfTp: getShowInfoCombo(cstInfo.ctfTp, ctfTp),
        ctfNum: getShowInfoItem(cstInfo.ctfNum),
        ctfExpDate: getShowInfoItem(cstInfo.ctfExpDate),
        cstTel: getShowInfoItem(cstInfo.cstTel),
        contactAddr: getShowInfoItem(cstInfo.contactAddr),
        taxIdtfyStatus: getShowInfoCombo(
          cstInfo.taxIdtfyStatus,
          taxIdtfyStatus
        ),
        cstNum: getShowInfoItem(cstInfo.cstNum),
        nationality: getShowInfoCombo(cstInfo.nationality, nationality),
        nation: getShowInfoCombo(cstInfo.nation, nation),
        birthDay: getShowInfoItem(cstInfo.birthDay),
        ctfSignatory: getShowInfoItem(cstInfo.ctfSignatory),
        workCorpName: getShowInfoItem(cstInfo.workCorpName),
        profession: getShowInfoCombo(cstInfo.profession, profession),
        cstLvl: getShowInfoCombo(cstInfo.cstLvl, cstLvl),
        cstRtg: getShowInfoItem(cstInfo.cstRtg),
      };
      if (cstInfo.cstLvl) {
        //"0": "普通", "1": "黄金客户", "2": "白金客户", "3": "钻石客户"
        switch (cstInfo.cstLvl) {
          case "0":
            this.lvlImage =
              "TEClientFM/static/img/hx-onservice/icon-普通客户.png";
            break;
          case "1":
            this.lvlImage =
              "TEClientFM/static/img/hx-onservice/icon-黄金客户.png";
            break;
          case "2":
            this.lvlImage =
              "TEClientFM/static/img/hx-onservice/icon-白金客户.png";
            break;
          case "3":
            this.lvlImage =
              "TEClientFM/static/img/hx-onservice/icon-钻石客户.png";
            break;
          default:
            break;
        }
      }
      function getShowInfoItem(value) {
        return value || "无";
      }
      function getShowInfoCombo(value, obj) {
        if (!value) return "无";
        return obj[value] || "无";
      }
    },
  1. 监听父组件传入的cstInfo，若改变重新调用setShowInfo方法设置界面显示值
  watch: {
    cstInfo: {
      handler(val) {
        this.setShowInfo(val);
      },
      deep: true,
      immediate: true,
    },
   ...
  },
  1. 实名状态、人脸识别结果、联网核查结果等可直接监听sdm中的值，交易改变这些值的时候客户视图显示的结果可动态改变。
6.8.1.2.12 ShowCstInfoPub

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\ShowCstInfoPub.vue

描述：对公客户信息

  1. 套路跟个人的差不多，不再赘述
6.8.1.2.13 BankCard

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\BankCard.vue

  1. 余额、可用余额需要验密之后才能查看，未验密之前使用*屏蔽金额相关字段
  2. 进入页面之后执行setShowInfo方法设置显示信息
mounted() {
    this.setShowInfo(this.mediaInfo);
  },

  setShowInfo(mediaInfo) {
      this.showInfo = {
        accSts: getShowInfoCombo(mediaInfo.accSts, accSts),
        balance: StringUtils.formatAmount(mediaInfo.balance),
        accBal: StringUtils.formatAmount(mediaInfo.accBal),
        accNum: StringUtils.formatAccount(mediaInfo.accNum || ""),
        accTp: getShowInfoCombo(mediaInfo.accTp, accTp),
        accAttr: getShowInfoCombo(mediaInfo.accAttr, accAttr),
        ccy: getShowInfoCombo(mediaInfo.ccy, ccy),
      };
      function getShowInfoCombo(value, obj) {
        if (!value) return "无";
        return obj[value] || "无";
      }
    },
  1. 监听父组件传入的介质信息mediaInfo，若有改变则重新调用setShowInfo方法设置显示值
 watch: {
    mediaInfo: {
      handler(val) {
        this.setShowInfo(this.mediaInfo);
      },
      immediate: true,
      deep: true,
    },
  },

  1. 点击账户列表按钮可弹窗显示该客户名下所有账户

    async selAccList() {
      // 点击账户列表后
      // 如果工作台已识别客户为本人办理，则展示“账户列表”（不包含当前已识别的账户信息）；如果客户无其他账户，则提示（消息框 确认型，按钮：【确认】）：“该客户无其他账户！”，提示确认后关闭提示信息。
      let res = await AcctUtils.queryAccListByCstNum(
        this,
        this.sdm.CustomerInfo.cstNum
      );
      if (res.isSuccess) {
        //根据客户号查询账户列表成功 dp2021
        let QryInfoArray = res.data.QryInfoArray; //账户列表

        if (QryInfoArray && QryInfoArray.length) {
          let itemArray = QryInfoArray.filter((item) => {
            return item.CustAcctNum == this.sdm.MediaInfo.accNum;
          });
          //删除已识别的账号
          itemArray.forEach((item) => {
            QryInfoArray.splice(QryInfoArray.indexOf(item), 1);
          });
        }
        if (QryInfoArray && !QryInfoArray.length) {
          await this.pushInfo("该客户无其他账户！");
          return;
        }
        this.info("获取账户列表信息");
        await this.$openPanel(
          "@FM/modules/frame/customer-view/customer-service/on-service/AccountListInfo.vue",
          "",
          "window",
          {
            acctList: QryInfoArray,
          }
        );
      }
    },

  2. 点击详情按钮可弹窗显示该账户的子账户列表

     //打开子账户列表
    accInfoDetail() {
      if (!this.sdm.MediaInfo.accNum) {
        return;
      }
      AcctUtils.querySubAccInfoByAccNum(
        this,
        this.sdm.MediaInfo.accNum
      ).then(async (res) => {
        if (res.isSuccess) {
          if (!res.data.AcctInfoArray) {
            await this.pushInfo("该账户名下无子账户");
            return;
          }

          //打开子账户列表,不是详情界面
          let subRes = await this.$openPanel(
            "@FM/modules/shared/ui-libs/cust/InputSubAccInfo.vue",
            "子账户列表",
            "window",
            {
              showMode: "onlyShow",
              accInfo: res.data, //账户信息
              CustAcctNum: this.sdm.MediaInfo.accNum, //主账户信息
            },
            {
              showClose: false,
              customStyle: { "margin-top": "-20px!important" },
            }
          );
          return;
        }
      });
    },
6.8.1.2.14 AccountListInfo

路径：TEClientFM\modules\frame\customer-view\customer-service\on-service\AccountListInfo.vue

描述：账户列表

  1. BankCard组件点击账户列表组件后显示该界面

  2. 柜员选择账户之后点击选择按钮或双击一条记录时可切换介质。调用EcifUtils.setAcctSDMInfo给sdm里设置介质信息。CustomerServiceView监听到sdm中介质信息发生改变之后调用对应方法刷新BankCard的props-mediaInfo，从而改变显示的介质信息。

      async confirm(row) {
      if (row) {
        this.currentRow = row;
      }
      // ------------------------------------
      // 点击时，判断是否已选择一行，如未选择，提示：“请选择一个账户”；
      // 如已选择，调用核心接口查询该账户名单信息，并关闭本交易，返回账户信息、账户名单信息并回显至账户信息视图；
      // 如果选择的账号未经过外设读取，则默认介质携带标志为客户本人办理未携带
      if (!this.currentRow) {
        this.pushInfo("请选择一条子账户！");
        return;
      }
      //调用2280,查询子账户列表,默认选择活期人民币子账户
      //暂时不考虑内部帐和待销账
      let Res_dp2280 = await AcctUtils.querySubAccInfoByAccNum(
        this,
        this.currentRow.CustAcctNum //客户账号
      );
      if (
        !Res_dp2280.data.AcctInfoArray ||
        !Res_dp2280.data.AcctInfoArray.length
      ) {
        let confirmRes = await this.pushConfirm(
          "无子账户信息，是否继续选择此账户？"
        );
        if (!confirmRes) {
          //更换介质
          return;
        } else {
          this.acctInfo.CustAcctNum = this.currentRow.CustAcctNum;
          this.acctInfo.subAccLength = "0";
          Object.assign(this.acctInfo, Res_dp2280.data);
        }
      } else {
        //有子账户信息,默认寻找活期人民币子账户
        let itemInfo = Res_dp2280.data.AcctInfoArray.find((item) => {
          return item.LbyPdTypeCd == "0" && item.CurrCd == "156";
        });
        //默认的子账户信息上提，删除其他子账户信息
        Object.assign(this.acctInfo, Res_dp2280.data, itemInfo);
        delete this.acctInfo.AcctInfoArray;
        //切换账户
        this.acctInfo.CustAcctNum = this.currentRow.CustAcctNum;
        this.acctInfo.subAccLength = Res_dp2280.data.AcctInfoArray.length;
      }
      this.dm.canSetSDM = true;
      EcifUtils.setAcctSDMInfo(this, this.acctInfo);
      this.$exitPanel();
    },
